## ContextFactory type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ContextFactory<TContext extends MachineContext, TActor extends ProvidedActor, TInput> = ({ spawn, input }: {
    spawn: Spawner<TActor>;
    input: TInput;
}) => TContext;
```
**References:** [MachineContext](./xstate.machinecontext.md)<></>, [ProvidedActor](./xstate.providedactor.md)<></>, [Spawner](./xstate.spawner.md)
